<S%H3588>Surely<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>nothing,<s%> <S%H1697><s%> but he <S%H1540>reveals<s%> his <S%H5475>secret<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets.<s%>

<S%H8085>Publish<s%> in the <S%H759>palaces<s%> at <S%H795>Ashdod,<s%> and in the <S%H759>palaces<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H622>Assemble<s%> yourselves on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> and <S%H7200>behold<s%> the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4103>tumults<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> thereof, and the <S%H6217>oppressed<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> thereof.

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> An <S%H6862>adversary<s%> there shall be even <S%H5439>round<s%> about the <S%H776>land;<s%> and he shall <S%H3381>bring<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> your <S%H5797>strength<s%> from you, and your <S%H759>palaces<s%> shall be <S%H962>spoiled.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> As the <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> <S%H5337>takes<s%> out of the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3767>legs,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H915>piece<s%> of an <S%H241>ear;<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H5337>taken<s%> out that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> in the <S%H6285>corner<s%> of a <S%H4296>bed,<s%> and in <S%H1833>Damascus<s%> in a <S%H6210>couch.<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> you, and <S%H5749>testify<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H5001>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%>
